headline: Assessing Expedia Group (EXPE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback And B2B Growth Narrative
summary: Recent share performance and business snapshot Expedia Group (EXPE) has drawn attention after a period of weaker share performance, with the stock showing negative returns over the past week, month and past 3 months despite a positive 1 year total return. Alongside this mixed price picture, the company reports annual revenue of US$14.73b and net income of US$1.29b. Both revenue and net income growth were recorded on an annual basis, giving investors concrete figures to compare against the...
